title: I got accepted but when I clicked the link it told me that my status is still pending?
body: Hi, I just received an Email earlier today saying that I've been selected as a PBE Tester with a link directing me to create a PBE account. But after I clicked into it and logged in, it was on the pending section. :(

replies.body:
I got a second e-mail saying...

Positive players and contributors (like you) just earned "first dibs" at testing out new features on PBE! Your new PBE accountâ€™s now unlocked, and you should already have another email from us with the steps to create your account. 

The first dibs part I am wondering if they sent a mass invite out and it was first come first served. If that is the case that might be the reason some of some of are having trouble making an PBE account. That sucks if that's the case though but fingers crossed that they are having issues with everyone signing up at once.
no, that's against the law, and if it isn't ill be sure to write my congressman to change it so it is against the law....how rude

The link saying you are accepted is automatic, but (for me at least) it took a little longer to officially "turn on" the ability to log in to the PBE client wise and forum wise. Granted it has been a long while for me so it could be different now.

Also keep in mind a ton of people are getting accepted at the moment and they have to manually go through and accept everything, so it might take a few hours seeing as there aren't usually so many people trying to get PBE accounts, let alone logging in. 

When did you guys see the accept email or whatever?
The email was sent like 3 hours ago. Well, i will probably try tomorrow and see if my status is still pending. Maybe it's just taking them time to add my name onto the list. Thanks for the help~

Just wanted everyone to know to not freak out, I had this same problem starting 5 hours ago but just an hour and a half ago i refreshed my PBE account status page and it let me create my account. Hang in there!
